title: MIER Men's Outdoor Performance Tactical Polo Shirts Short and Long Sleeve, Moisture-Wicking
description: MIER men's long and short sleeve polo shirt features sweat-wicking material that pulls moisture away from the body to keep you cool and dry
No-roll collar gives this polo shirt a professional look with all the tactical functionality to get the job done. 3-button placket front with mic tab/sunglasses loop. Mic clips on both shoulders
Gusseted mesh underarm increases ventilation and range of motion. Reinforced dual pen pockets on left sleeve. Normal length, you can wear them tucked-in and untucked
UPF 50+ protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays. MIER high-performance polo shirt ideal for a broad range of job environments and casual shirts. Fade, shrink and wrinkle-resistant
Versatile Wear: Simple look and split hem design, these polo shirts for men are more suitable for outdoor work, tactical clothes, business, fishing, also suitable for golf, hiking and casual wear
